q1.question: How can I publish an event?
q1.answer: Register as a club or federation, complete your profile and submit your event for approval. It's completely free.

q2.question: How often is the calendar updated?
q2.answer: We update the calendar monthly with official events from all Spanish federations.

q3.question: Can I receive event notifications?
q3.answer: Yes, subscribe for free and configure your discipline and region preferences to receive personalized alerts.

q4.question: What disciplines are included?
q4.answer: Swimming, open water, triathlon, water polo, synchronized swimming, diving and all official aquatic modalities.

silicona.pageTitle: Custom Silicone Swimming Caps | From ‚Ç¨4.45 | AquaEvents.club
silicona.metaDescription: Custom silicone swimming caps for clubs from ‚Ç¨4.45. Premium 50GMS thickness, 100% hypoallergenic. Free shipping in Spain. 30+ colors available.
silicona.heroP1: We are one of Europe's leading, longest-established, and most trusted suppliers of fully custom and printed swimming caps, alongside a wide range of other products and services.
silicona.heroP2: We specialize exclusively in swimming caps and are experts in this technical and specialized area of printing. Our caps are ideal for daily users, guaranteed to withstand much more wear and tear.
silicona.heroP3: This one-size silicone cap is suitable for both adults and children. The molded shape and fit are engineered to provide maximum comfort alongside peak performance.

faqs.question: What is the difference between silicone and latex caps?
faqs.answer: Silicone caps are more durable (1-2 years vs 3-6 months), hypoallergenic, and comfortable for regular use. Latex caps are more economical (‚Ç¨2.10 vs ‚Ç¨4.45) and thinner, ideal for one-off events. Silicone is chlorine-resistant and does not cause allergies.

faqs.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
faqs.answer: The minimum order quantity is 50 units. We offer significant discounts for orders of 100, 250, 500, 1000, and over 1500 units.

faqs.question: Are silicone caps suitable for people with allergies?
faqs.answer: Yes, silicone caps are 100% hypoallergenic and do not contain latex. They are perfect for people with sensitivity or allergy to latex.

faqs.question: How long do silicone caps last?
faqs.answer: With proper care, silicone caps last 1-2 years with regular use. They are much more durable than latex caps (3-6 months) and are resistant to chlorine and UV rays.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for official competitions?
faqs.answer: Yes, our silicone caps comply with FINA regulations and can be used in official competitions. Many professional swimmers prefer silicone for its durability and comfort.

faqs.question: What is the thickness of the silicone caps?
faqs.answer: Our silicone caps have a premium thickness of 50GMS (grams per square meter), providing the perfect balance between durability, comfort, and performance.

faqs.question: How should silicone caps be cared for?
faqs.answer: Rinse them with cold water after each use and dry them completely before storing. Avoid contact with sharp objects and store them in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.

faqs.question: How many printing colors can I choose?
faqs.answer: You can choose 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 printing colors. The base price of ‚Ç¨4.45 includes 1-color printing. Each additional color costs ‚Ç¨0.60 per unit.

faqs.question: What is the delivery time?
faqs.answer: The production and delivery time is approximately 3 weeks from order confirmation. We offer free shipping throughout Europe.

faqs.question: Can I see a design proof before production?
faqs.answer: Yes, we will send you a digital proof for your approval before production begins. You can request changes until you are completely satisfied with the design.

main.metaDescription: Custom swimming caps for clubs. Silicone, latex, lycra, long hair and fabric. From ‚Ç¨4.45. Free shipping.
main.heroP1: We are one of Europe's leading suppliers of custom swimming caps. We offer 5 types of caps for all needs.
main.heroP2: With over 25 years of experience, we have supplied over 1 million caps to clubs, federations and events across Europe.

latex.pageTitle: Custom Latex Swimming Caps | From ‚Ç¨3.95 | AquaEvents.club
latex.metaDescription: Custom latex swimming caps for clubs from ‚Ç¨3.95. Economical and flexible. Free shipping Spain.
latex.heroP1: We are one of Europe's leading suppliers of custom swimming caps. Latex caps are ideal for one-time events and promotional gifts.
latex.heroP2: Latex caps are made from a thin layer of latex, commonly used for one-time events or promotional giveaways.

faqs.question: What is the difference between latex and silicone caps?
faqs.answer: Latex caps are more economical (‚Ç¨2.10 vs ‚Ç¨4.45) and thinner, ideal for one-time events and promotional gifts. Silicone caps are more durable, hypoallergenic and comfortable for regular use. Latex is less resistant to chlorine and may cause allergies in some people.

faqs.question: What is the minimum order?
faqs.answer: The minimum order is 100 units. We offer significant discounts for orders of 250, 500, 1000 and 1500+ units.

faqs.question: Are latex caps suitable for people with allergies?
faqs.answer: No, latex caps contain natural latex which can cause allergic reactions. For people with latex allergy, we recommend silicone caps (100% hypoallergenic) or lycra.

faqs.question: How long do latex caps last?
faqs.answer: Latex caps are ideal for one-time events or occasional use. They are not as durable as silicone (last 3-6 months vs 1-2 years), but they are very economical and perfect for promotional gifts.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for official competitions?
faqs.answer: Yes, latex caps comply with FINA regulations and can be used in official competitions. However, many swimmers prefer silicone for competitions due to its greater durability and comfort.

faqs.question: What thickness are latex caps?
faqs.answer: Latex caps have a thickness of approximately 0.3-0.4mm, much thinner than silicone (50GMS). This makes them lighter and more economical, but less durable.

faqs.question: How do you care for latex caps?
faqs.answer: Rinse with cold water after each use and dry completely before storing. Avoid contact with oils, creams and sharp objects. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

faqs.question: How many print colors can I choose?
faqs.answer: You can choose 1 print color. The base price of ‚Ç¨2.10 includes 1-color printing. For multiple colors, check out our silicone cap options.

faqs.question: What is the delivery time?
faqs.answer: The production and delivery time is approximately 3 weeks from order confirmation. We offer free shipping in Europe.

faqs.question: What type of events are latex caps ideal for?
faqs.answer: Latex caps are perfect for one-time events such as triathlons, open water swims, championships, corporate gifts and promotions. Their economical price makes them ideal when you need many units for a specific event.

gamuza.pageTitle: Custom Suede Swimming Caps | From ‚Ç¨5.95 | AquaEvents.club
gamuza.metaDescription: Custom suede swimming caps for clubs from ‚Ç¨5.95. Soft and comfortable. Free shipping Spain.
gamuza.heroP1: We are one of Europe's leading suppliers of custom swimming caps. Lycra caps offer exceptional softness and comfort.
gamuza.heroP2: Lycra caps are made with soft synthetic lycra material, ideal for swimmers seeking maximum comfort.

faqs.question: What is the difference between lycra and silicone swimming caps?
faqs.answer: Lycra caps are softer and more comfortable (‚Ç¨5.95), ideal for sensitive skin and long training sessions. Silicone caps are more durable and water-resistant (‚Ç¨4.45), better for competitions. Lycra is breathable and does not pull hair.

faqs.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
faqs.answer: The minimum order quantity is 50 units. We offer significant discounts for orders of 100, 250, 500, 1000, and 1500+ units.

faqs.question: Are lycra caps suitable for people with allergies?
faqs.answer: Yes, lycra caps are hypoallergenic and do not contain latex. They are perfect for people with latex sensitivity or sensitive skin.

faqs.question: How long do lycra caps last?
faqs.answer: With proper care, lycra caps last 6 to 12 months with regular use. They are less durable than silicone caps, but much more comfortable for long sessions.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for official competitions?
faqs.answer: Lycra caps are more commonly used for training and recreational swimming. For competitions, we recommend silicone caps due to their better hydrodynamics and durability.

faqs.question: What material are the lycra caps made of?
faqs.answer: Our lycra caps are made with a blend of polyester and elastane (lycra), providing softness, elasticity, and breathability.

faqs.question: How should I care for lycra caps?
faqs.answer: Hand wash with cold water and mild soap after each use. Air dry away from direct sunlight. Do not machine wash or tumble dry.

faqs.question: How many printing colors can I choose?
faqs.answer: You can choose full-color sublimation printing with unlimited colors. The price of ‚Ç¨5.95 includes full-color printing.

faqs.question: What is the delivery time?
faqs.answer: The production and delivery time is approximately 3 weeks from order confirmation. We offer free shipping throughout Spain.

faqs.question: Are lycra caps suitable for children?
faqs.answer: Yes, lycra caps are ideal for children due to their softness and ease of placement. They do not pull hair and are very comfortable for swimming lessons.

peloLargo.pageTitle: Custom Long Hair Swimming Caps | From ‚Ç¨6.45 | AquaEvents.club
peloLargo.metaDescription: Custom long hair swimming caps from ‚Ç¨6.45. Special design with extra space. Free shipping.
peloLargo.heroP1: We are one of Europe's leading suppliers of custom swimming caps. Long hair caps feature a special design with extra space.
peloLargo.heroP2: Long hair caps are designed with an extra pouch at the back to comfortably accommodate long hair.

faqs.question: What is the difference between long hair caps and regular caps?
faqs.answer: Long hair caps have an extra pouch at the back (‚Ç¨6.45) to comfortably accommodate long hair without pulling or tangling it. Regular silicone caps (‚Ç¨4.45) are designed for short or tied-up hair.

faqs.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
faqs.answer: The minimum order is 50 units. We offer significant discounts for orders of 100, 250, 500, 1000, and 1500+ units.

faqs.question: Are long hair caps suitable for people with allergies?
faqs.answer: Yes, our long hair caps are made of 100% hypoallergenic silicone and are latex-free. They are perfect for individuals with latex sensitivity.

faqs.question: How long do long hair caps last?
faqs.answer: With proper care, silicone long hair caps last 1-2 years with regular use. They are as durable as regular silicone caps and resistant to chlorine.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for official competitions?
faqs.answer: Yes, long hair caps comply with FINA regulations and can be used in official competitions. Many professional swimmers with long hair use this type of cap.

faqs.question: What is the thickness of the long hair caps?
faqs.answer: Our long hair caps have the same premium thickness as regular silicone caps (50GMS), with the extra space at the back for the hair.

faqs.question: How should long hair caps be cared for?
faqs.answer: Rinse with cold water after each use and dry completely before storing. Avoid contact with sharp objects and store them in a cool, dry place.

faqs.question: How many printing colors can I choose?
faqs.answer: You can choose 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 printing colors. The base price of ‚Ç¨6.45 includes 1-color printing. Each additional color adds ‚Ç¨0.60 per unit.

faqs.question: What is the delivery time?
faqs.answer: The production and delivery time is approximately 3 weeks from order confirmation. We offer free shipping throughout Europe.

faqs.question: How much hair can fit in a long hair cap?
faqs.answer: Long hair caps can comfortably accommodate hair up to waist length. The extra pouch provides enough space to prevent pulling or discomfort.

tela.pageTitle: Custom Fabric Swimming Caps | From ‚Ç¨4.95 | AquaEvents.club
tela.metaDescription: Custom fabric/lycra swimming caps from ‚Ç¨4.95. Comfortable for training. Free shipping Spain.
tela.heroP1: We are one of Europe's leading suppliers of custom swimming caps. Fabric/lycra caps are ideal for training and daily use.
tela.heroP2: Fabric caps are made from breathable polyester/lycra, perfect for long training sessions and recreational use.

faqs.question: What is the difference between fabric (textile) caps and silicone caps?
faqs.answer: Fabric caps are more comfortable and breathable (‚Ç¨4.95), ideal for training and recreational use. Silicone caps are more water-resistant and durable (‚Ç¨4.45), better suited for competitions. Fabric caps do not pull hair and are easier to put on.

faqs.question: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
faqs.answer: The minimum order quantity is 50 units. We offer significant discounts for orders of 100, 250, 500, 1000, and 1500+ units.

faqs.question: Are fabric caps suitable for people with allergies?
faqs.answer: Yes, fabric caps are hypoallergenic and latex-free. They are perfect for people with latex sensitivity or sensitive skin.

faqs.question: How long do fabric caps last?
faqs.answer: With proper care, fabric caps last 6 to 12 months with regular use. They are less durable than silicone caps but much more comfortable for long sessions.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for official competitions?
faqs.answer: Fabric caps are most commonly used for training and recreational swimming. For competitions, we recommend silicone caps due to their superior hydrodynamics and water resistance.

faqs.question: What material are the fabric caps made of?
faqs.answer: Our fabric caps are made with a blend of polyester and lycra/elastane, providing softness, elasticity, and breathability.

faqs.question: How should fabric caps be cared for?
faqs.answer: Hand wash with cold water and mild soap after each use. Air dry away from direct sunlight. Do not machine wash or tumble dry.

faqs.question: How many printing colors can I choose?
faqs.answer: You can choose full-color sublimation printing with unlimited colors. The ‚Ç¨4.95 price includes full-color printing.

faqs.question: What is the delivery time?
faqs.answer: The production and delivery time is approximately 3 weeks from order confirmation. We offer free shipping throughout Spain.

faqs.question: Are fabric caps suitable for children and swimming schools?
faqs.answer: Yes, fabric caps are ideal for children and swimming schools due to their softness, ease of placement, and economical price for bulk orders.
